metadata.name: Pedestrian Detection Pipeline
metadata.description: Detect pedestrians and estimate depth using YOLOv5 and Depth Pro in Google Cloud Dataflow.

parameters.name: input_topic
parameters.label: Input Pub/Sub Topic
parameters.helpText: Pub/Sub topic from which the pipeline will read input images.

parameters.name: output_topic
parameters.label: Output Pub/Sub Topic
parameters.helpText: Pub/Sub topic where the pipeline will publish detection results.
